LanguageData.RkM_BardLute.label: 吟游诗人鲁特琴
LanguageData.RkM_BardLute.description: 一把音色优美的木质鲁特琴。鼠鼠们用它演奏动人的歌曲。
LanguageData.RkM_Santier.label: Santier's Spear
LanguageData.RkM_Santier.description: A spear that was embedded in a stone statue.\nAccording to an old local legend, a great spear was used to defeat Santier, the walking statue. Perhaps this is that very spear.\nBut it will be difficult to utilize such a thing in the manner of a spear. Your only choice is to swing it around, and smite foes about the head.
LanguageData.RkM_Santier_broken.label: Santier's Spear (broken)
LanguageData.RkM_Santier_broken.description: The outer shell has shattered, revealing the true form within. It strikes with rapid twinblade slashes. \nA broken weapon never breaks again, like how a dead man never dies twice.
